extendedInfo.description: Space Defense is an perfect and only one available for Android Space Impact game remake knowed from Nokia 3310 phones. If you loved to play this game in the past and want to play again for hours this is the best choice for you. You can't find any other game that is so simple and fun as this.It is made as similar to original game as I could.- original graphics- original controls- 8 original levels- original soundsHistory: Space Impact Invaders was a video game found on several Nokia Mobile phones including the Nokia 3310, Nokia 3320, Nokia 3330, Nokia 3350, Nokia 3360, Nokia 3390, Nokia 3410, Nokia 3610, Nokia 5210, Nokia 5510, Nokia 6310, Nokia 6310i, Nokia 6510 Nokia 8855, Nokia 2100.The player has the ability to freely move horizontally and vertically (with a few exceptions on some platform-like levels in Space Impact 2) but can not increase the speed of the screen's auto-scrolling feature. Powerups can be picked up while going through the levels (such as rockets or lasers) and the player can use them when the regular projectiles are of little effect against the enemy.As each level is played, various enemy ships confront the player, some of them following strict paths, others following the ship itself and others shooting it (with the latest games the player can encounter sub-bosses midway through the level too). On the first game there are eight levels, set on different planets and underground areas, with a boss at the end of each level.After losing all his lives, the player is awarded a score and depending on how many enemies killed, how many powerups picked and how many levels the player passed, that score can be placed on the Top Scores page in the game's menu.Space invaders, Space defense, space attack, space ship

reviews.title: So much memories
reviews.comment: I loved the game on NOKIA 3310 and I love this app. But you should fix the problem where the worlds obstacles disappear. I always crash in level 3 and so on. Please fix that!
reviews.author: Rytis Grubliauskis

reviews.title: Brings back memories.
reviews.comment: I loved this game since I was a child, and I\'ve finally reunited with it. I love it so much, only problem I have is that the third level is a bit rigged... when I dodge an enemy bullet, it still says I get hit... but by what? There is nothing around to hurt me.

reviews.comment: Thnks BYQ DEVELOP for making this game availabe for me to download on my s2 this game was a huge chunk of my childhood n i forgot it i forgot the name until recently this game is everything i remember it has the same feel as i remember thank you once again i found a similar game called r type but it wasnt it so thnks oh n u should do an update to make the controls a bit easier cause the buttons r to close together n its hard to move n shoot your normal guns n rockets\tThnks BYQ thnks a lot
reviews.author: Draven Maher

reviews.title: Excellent concept, BUT:
reviews.comment: Apart from the glitches mentioned in other comments, this app also brings a bunch of notification ads and new icons to your home screen. \"Apps\" icon and icons for other games. I don\'t care what it is for, it\'s frustrating and looks dodgy when an innocent game puts a bunch of new stuff on your phone.
reviews.author: Frederik Nagel

reviews.title: There are some glitches but I still enjoyed it somehow
reviews.comment: There are some glitches that needs to be fixed.. like the issue starting from the 3rd level onwards.. the background of the game starts to disappear while the game is on-going.. and also when the game is already over, it keeps on looping by going to the menu first then would go back again to the last scene of the ended game and then would do it over and over.. please fix it.. i really like this game a lot.. :(
reviews.author: A Google User
